header.type: HUMAN RIGHTS VIOLATIONS, SUBMISSIONS QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS

testimony: Nonkwanda Nora you have heard the evidence that was put before the Commission.   We have a statement before us on your behalf.   Is there something that you would like to add?
Thank you.  There is nothing that I would like to add.

You, therefore, confirm that this evidence that was put before us is true?
 You are quite young.  How are you involved in this incident?
I was three months old when this incident occurred.   My brother told me what happened.
